      Constant value to define item select event

      voidonCellClicked(BBjCustomEvent e!)

      A generic event listener for the grid cell clicks

      The listener will redirect events to other methods according to the current selected column in the grid.

      voidonItemSelected(BBjCustomEvent e!)

      Update the grid with the selected item

      Update the grid with the selected item and fire back an ::BBjSettingsWidget/SwEvents.bbj::SwEventsItemSelected event with the instance of the current selected item & group.

      voidonItemTitleChanged(BBjCustomEvent e!)

      Update the selected item

      Update the item's title and fire back an ::BBjSettingsWidget/SwEvents.bbj::SwEventsItemChanged event with the instance of the selected group and the selcted item.

      voidonTabSelected(BBjTabSelectedEvent e!)

      Update the grid with the group items

      Update the grid with the group items and fire back an ::BBjSettingsWidget/SwEvents.bbj::SwEventsGroupSelected event with the instance of the current selected group.

      voidredraw(Boolean init!)

      force the widget redraw whenever the widget needs to be rendered

      voidremoveGroup(SwModelsGroup group!)

      Remove group from the widget

      voidremoveGroup(BBjString groupId!)

      Remove group from the widget

      voidremoveItem(SwModelsGroup group!, SwModelsItem item!)

      Remove an item from the given group

      voidremoveItem(BBjString groupId!, SwModelsItem item!)

      Remove an item from the given group

      voidremoveItem(BBjString groupId!, BBjString itemId!)

      Remove an item from the given group

      voidremoveItem(SwModelsGroup group!, BBjString itemId!)

      Remove an item from the given group

      voidsetSelectedGroup(BBjString groupId!)

      Set the selected group using the passed group id

      This method will not throw an error in case the group is not managed by the widget. It will simplly fallback and select the first group or nothing if no groups are added yet.

      voidsetSize(BBjNumber w!, BBjNumber h!)

      Update the widget size

      voidupdateGrid()

      Reforce the grid update for the current selected group

      The method will send again to the client all required data form the group like new items and new settings

      • onCellClicked

        public void onCellClicked(BBjCustomEvent e!)

        A generic event listener for the grid cell clicks

        The listener will redirect events to other methods according to the current selected column in the grid.

        Parameters:
        BBjCustomEvent e! The event instance

      • onItemSelected

        public void onItemSelected(BBjCustomEvent e!)

        Update the grid with the selected item

        Update the grid with the selected item and fire back an ::BBjSettingsWidget/SwEvents.bbj::SwEventsItemSelected event with the instance of the current selected item & group.

        Parameters:
        BBjCustomEvent e! event instance

      • onItemTitleChanged

        public void onItemTitleChanged(BBjCustomEvent e!)

        Update the selected item

        Update the item's title and fire back an ::BBjSettingsWidget/SwEvents.bbj::SwEventsItemChanged event with the instance of the selected group and the selcted item.

        Parameters:
        BBjCustomEvent e! The event instance

      • onTabSelected

        public void onTabSelected(BBjTabSelectedEvent e!)

        Update the grid with the group items

        Update the grid with the group items and fire back an ::BBjSettingsWidget/SwEvents.bbj::SwEventsGroupSelected event with the instance of the current selected group.

        Parameters:
        BBjTabSelectedEvent e! event instance

      • redraw

        public void redraw(Boolean init!)

        force the widget redraw whenever the widget needs to be rendered

        Parameters:
        Boolean init! if TRUE the control is rendered for the first time so this method has to perform initial rendering

      • setSelectedGroup

        public void setSelectedGroup(BBjString groupId!)

        Set the selected group using the passed group id

        This method will not throw an error in case the group is not managed by the widget. It will simplly fallback and select the first group or nothing if no groups are added yet.

        Parameters:
        BBjString groupId! The Group's id

      • setSize

        public void setSize(BBjNumber w!, BBjNumber h!)

        Update the widget size

        Parameters:
        BBjNumber w! The windget's width
        BBjNumber h! The windget's height

      • updateGrid

        public void updateGrid()

        Reforce the grid update for the current selected group

        The method will send again to the client all required data form the group like new items and new settings
